```{r setup}
library(fars)
```

## Setup and Data Location

The FARS data files are stored in the package's `inst/extdata` directory. To use the functions in this package, you first need to locate these files on your system:

```{r}
# Locate the sample data provided with the package
fars_path <- system.file("extdata", package = "fars")

# List available files
list.files(fars_path)

# Set working directory to where the data lives
setwd(fars_path)

# Now run the summary
fars_summarize_years(c(2013, 2014, 2015))
```
